parts.text: {"word":"spinous","priority":"★☆☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"とげのある、とげだらけの","english_definition":"Having spines or thorns; thorny.","examples":[{"sentence":"The stem of the rose bush is spinous.","translation":"そのバラの茂みの茎はとげだらけだ。"},{"sentence":"Many desert plants are spinous to protect themselves from herbivores.","translation":"多くの砂漠の植物は、草食動物から身を守るためにとげがある。"}],"collocations":["spinous process (棘突起)","spinous shrub (とげのある低木)"],"synonyms":["thorny","prickly","spiky","barbed"],"antonyms":["spineless","smooth","unarmed"]},{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"（解剖学）棘状の、棘突起の","english_definition":"(Anatomy) Resembling a spine or thorn; relating to a spinous process.","examples":[{"sentence":"The spinous process of the vertebra is easily palpable.","translation":"椎骨の棘突起は触診しやすい。"}],"collocations":["spinous process (棘突起)"],"synonyms":["spinal","thornlike"],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の「spinosus」（とげのある）から派生。これは「spina」（とげ、背骨）に由来する。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˈspaɪnəs/","syllables":"spi-nous"},"inflection":{"notes":"形容詞なので、比較級・最上級は通常、more spinous, most spinous のように表現します。"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**spinous**」は、主に植物や動物の体の表面に「とげ」や「棘」がある状態を指す専門的な言葉です。日常会話で頻繁に使われる単語ではありませんが、植物学や動物学、解剖学などの分野では、特定の構造や特徴を記述する際に用いられます。解剖学においては、特に脊椎の「棘突起」を指す場合に使われます。より一般的な「とげのある」という意味では、"thorny" や "prickly" がより一般的に使われます。","priority":"★★☆"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ The spinous plant was very beautiful.","correct":"✓ The thorny plant was very beautiful.","note":"「とげのある植物」を一般的に表現する場合は、"thorny" の方がより自然です。"spinous" はより専門的な文脈で使われます。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The spinous process was very painful.","correct":"✓ The spinous process was very tender.","note":"棘突起の痛みを表現する場合は、"painful" よりも "tender"（押すと痛い）の方がより適切です。"}],"priority":"★☆☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["spine (名詞: とげ、背骨)","spinule (名詞: 小さなとげ)","spinosity (名詞: とげの多い状態)"],"idioms_phrases":[],"priority":"★☆☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"C2","frequency_google_ngram":"低頻度 (Low frequency) - 専門用語。","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"C1","text":"「**spinous**」は、とげや棘があることを表す、やや専門的な単語です。植物学や動物学、解剖学などの分野で使われます。日常会話ではあまり使いませんが、学術的な文章や専門的な議論では見かけることがあります。例えば、植物の茎や葉にとげがある状態を説明する際に使われます。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The **spinous** leaves of the thistle provide protection from grazing animals.","translation":"アザミのとげのある葉は、放牧動物からの保護を提供する。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"とげのある"},{"sentence":"The doctor palpated the **spinous** processes of the patient's spine.","translation":"医師は患者の脊椎の棘突起を触診した。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"棘状の (解剖学)"}]}
